timeline.message:
Remove role handling

As there are no sensitive services anymore

Remove multipart handling

And documentation to scripting and analyst, which were using it
Remove AlertPatch and move logic to TransitAlert
Add missing methods from Index API

timeline.bodyText: Should this be mentioned in the migration guide?
timeline.author: t2gran

timeline.bodyText: I expect there to be merge conflicts with the current dev-2.x branch for this file. It is ok to accept what ever is in the dev-2.x branch and just comment out the sections that do not compile. We (Entur) can fixit after it is merged.
timeline.author: t2gran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1080,32 +1080,55 @@ public TransmodelIndexGraphQLSchema(Graph graph, RoutingRequest defaultRequest)
                         .name("id")
                         .type(new GraphQLNonNull(Scalars.GraphQLID))
                         .dataFetcher(environment -> relay.toGlobalId(
-                                ptSituationElementType.getName(), ((AlertPatch) environment.getSource()).getId()))
+                                ptSituationElementType.getName(), ((TransitAlert) environment.getSource()).getId()))

replies.bodyText: Merge conflicts were fixed, and everything at least compiles succesfully
replies.author: hannesj

timeline.bodyText: @lassetyr Would you mind to review this part? The changes to the Siri updaters.
timeline.author: t2gran

replies.bodyText: Looks good, I am also in favor of merging.
